snippet.title: SIT DOWN, PLEASE - LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
My first official game it's now available for free. My dream finally came true, now I only have to let you play it =).

Play it for free on Game Jolt: 
https://gamejolt.com/games/sit_down_please/527444

Play it for free on Itch.io: 
https://sawyheartgames.itch.io/sit-down-please

Subscribe to my channel and follow me on my socials if you are interested in my work:
 -Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sawyheart/?hl=it
 -Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sawyheart
 If you want, you can support me here: https://ko-fi.com/sawyheart

About the game:
SIT DOWN, PLEASE aims to create a dark setting and a creepy/horror atmosphere while telling its story. It's a story driven game where a scientist, in order to achieve a goal for the sake of his kingdom, subjects the people of the recently defeated enemy faction to atrocious experiments.
The more the agony will be prolonged, the faster the goal will be reached. Your main purpose is just that: with purely arcade gameplay you'll have, using the scientist's machinery, to keep the guinea pigs alive as long as possible. In this way the coveted objective will be reached more quickly and you will be able to fully know the story of each guinea pig and put all the pieces together to understand the origins and the story of this world.

Will you be able to reach the end of this path?
